91 bool SFE_ADS122C04::begin(uint8_t deviceAddress, std::string bus)
92 {
93  _deviceAddress = deviceAddress; //If provided, store the I2C address from user
94  _i2c_fd = 0;
95  _wireMode = ADS122C04_RAW_MODE; //Default to using 'safe' settings (disable the IDAC current sources)
96 
97  // wait for power-on reset to complete (datasheet says we should do this)
98  // minimum of 500us required
99  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(1));
100 
101  if ((_i2c_fd = open(bus.c_str(), O_RDWR)) < 0) std::exit(1);
102 
103  if (ioctl(_i2c_fd, I2C_SLAVE, _deviceAddress) < 0){
104  close(_i2c_fd);
105  std::exit(1);
106  }
107 
108  // Get functionality flags
109  unsigned long funcs;
110  if (ioctl(_i2c_fd, I2C_FUNCS, &funcs) < 0){
111  LOG("Failed to read I2C functionality.");
112  exit(1);
113  }
114 
115  reset(); // reset the ADS122C04 (datasheet says we should do this)
116 
117  // Default to using 'safe' settings (disable the IDAC current sources)
118  return(configureADCmode(ADS122C04_RAW_MODE));
119 }
120 
130 bool SFE_ADS122C04::configureADCmode(uint8_t wire_mode, uint8_t rate)
131 {
132  ADS122C04_initParam initParams; // Storage for the chip parameters
133 
134  if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_4WIRE_MODE) // 4-wire mode
135  {
136  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
137  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_8; // Set the gain to 8
138  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED; // The PGA must be enabled for gains >= 8
139  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
140  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
141  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
142  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_EXT_REF_PINS; // Use the external REF pins
143  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF; // Disable the temperature sensor
144  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
145  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
146  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
147  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_1000_UA; // Set the IDAC current to 1mA
148  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN3; // Route IDAC1 to AIN3
149  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC2
150  _wireMode = ADS122C04_4WIRE_MODE; // Update the wire mode
151  }
152  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_4WIRE_HI_TEMP) // 4-wire mode for high temperatures (gain = 4)
153  {
154  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
155  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_4; // Set the gain to 4
156  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED; // Enable the PGA
157  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
158  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
159  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
160  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_EXT_REF_PINS; // Use the external REF pins
161  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF; // Disable the temperature sensor
162  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
163  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
164  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
165  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_1000_UA; // Set the IDAC current to 1mA
166  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN3; // Route IDAC1 to AIN3
167  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC2
168  _wireMode = ADS122C04_4WIRE_HI_TEMP; // Update the wire mode
169  }
170  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_3WIRE_MODE) // 3-wire mode
171  {
172  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
173  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_8; // Set the gain to 8
174  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED; // The PGA must be enabled for gains >= 8
175  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
176  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
177  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
178  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_EXT_REF_PINS; // Use the external REF pins
179  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF; // Disable the temperature sensor
180  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
181  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
182  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
183  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_500_UA; // Set the IDAC current to 0.5mA
184  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN2; // Route IDAC1 to AIN2
185  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_AIN3; // Route IDAC2 to AIN3
186  _wireMode = ADS122C04_3WIRE_MODE; // Update the wire mode
187  }
188  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_3WIRE_HI_TEMP) // 3-wire mode for high temperatures (gain = 4)
189  {
190  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
191  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_4; // Set the gain to 4
192  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED; // Enable the PGA
193  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
194  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
195  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
196  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_EXT_REF_PINS; // Use the external REF pins
197  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF; // Disable the temperature sensor
198  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
199  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
200  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
201  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_500_UA; // Set the IDAC current to 0.5mA
202  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN2; // Route IDAC1 to AIN2
203  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_AIN3; // Route IDAC2 to AIN3
204  _wireMode = ADS122C04_3WIRE_HI_TEMP; // Update the wire mode
205  }
206  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_2WIRE_MODE) // 2-wire mode
207  {
208  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
209  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_8; // Set the gain to 8
210  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED; // The PGA must be enabled for gains >= 8
211  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
212  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
213  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
214  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_EXT_REF_PINS; // Use the external REF pins
215  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF; // Disable the temperature sensor
216  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
217  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
218  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
219  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_1000_UA; // Set the IDAC current to 1mA
220  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN3; // Route IDAC1 to AIN3
221  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC2
222  _wireMode = ADS122C04_2WIRE_MODE; // Update the wire mode
223  }
224  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_2WIRE_HI_TEMP) // 2-wire mode for high temperatures (gain = 4)
225  {
226  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
227  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_4; // Set the gain to 4
228  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED; // Enable the PGA
229  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
230  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
231  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
232  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_EXT_REF_PINS; // Use the external REF pins
233  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF; // Disable the temperature sensor
234  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
235  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
236  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
237  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_1000_UA; // Set the IDAC current to 1mA
238  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_AIN3; // Route IDAC1 to AIN3
239  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC2
240  _wireMode = ADS122C04_2WIRE_HI_TEMP; // Update the wire mode
241  }
242  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_TEMPERATURE_MODE) // Internal temperature mode
243  {
244  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
245  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_1; // Set the gain to 1
246  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_DISABLED;
247  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
248  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
249  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
250  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_INTERNAL; // Use the internal 2.048V reference
251  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_ON; // Enable the temperature sensor
252  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
253  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
254  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
255  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the IDAC current
256  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC1
257  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC2
258  _wireMode = ADS122C04_TEMPERATURE_MODE; // Update the wire mode
259  }
260  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_RAW_MODE) // Raw mode : disable the IDAC and use the internal reference
261  {
262  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0; // Route AIN1 to AINP and AIN0 to AINN
263  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_1; // Set the gain to 1
264  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_DISABLED;
265  initParams.dataRate = rate; // Set the data rate (samples per second). Defaults to 20
266  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL; // Disable turbo mode
267  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // Use single shot mode
268  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_INTERNAL; // Use the internal 2.048V reference
269  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF; // Disable the temperature sensor
270  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE; // Disable the data counter
271  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED; // Disable CRC checking
272  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the burn-out current
273  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_OFF; // Disable the IDAC current
274  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC1
275  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED; // Disable IDAC2
276  _wireMode = ADS122C04_RAW_MODE; // Update the wire mode
277  }
278  else if (wire_mode == ADS122C04_POL_OP_MODE)
279  {
280  initParams.inputMux = ADS122C04_MUX_AIN1_AIN0;
281  initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_1; // May change step size
282  //initParams.gainLevel = ADS122C04_GAIN_8; // May change step size
283  initParams.pgaBypass = ADS122C04_PGA_ENABLED; // PGA should be enabled.
284  initParams.dataRate = rate;
285  initParams.opMode = ADS122C04_OP_MODE_NORMAL;
286  initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_CONTINUOUS; // May change to continuous (DCNT)
287  //initParams.convMode = ADS122C04_CONVERSION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT; // May change to continuous (DCNT)
288  initParams.selectVref = ADS122C04_VREF_INTERNAL; // Might be an issue
289  initParams.tempSensorEn = ADS122C04_TEMP_SENSOR_OFF;
290  initParams.dataCounterEn = ADS122C04_DCNT_DISABLE;
291  initParams.dataCRCen = ADS122C04_CRC_DISABLED;
292  initParams.burnOutEn = ADS122C04_BURN_OUT_CURRENT_OFF;
293  initParams.idacCurrent = ADS122C04_IDAC_CURRENT_OFF;
294  initParams.routeIDAC1 = ADS122C04_IDAC1_DISABLED;
295  initParams.routeIDAC2 = ADS122C04_IDAC2_DISABLED;
296  _wireMode = ADS122C04_POL_OP_MODE;
297  }
298  else
299  {
300  if (_printDebug == true)
301  {
302  LOG("configureADCmode: unknown mode");
303  }
304  return(false);
305  }
306  lastInitParams = initParams; // Record last init params
307  return(ADS122C04_init(&initParams)); // Configure the chip
308 }

356 float SFE_ADS122C04::readPT100Centigrade(void) // Read the temperature in Centigrade
357 {
358  raw_voltage_union raw_v; // union to convert uint32_t to int32_t
359  unsigned long start_time = _millis(); // Record the start time so we can timeout
360  bool drdy = false; // DRDY (1 == new data is ready)
361  float ret_val = 0.0; // Return value
362  float RTD, POLY; // Variables needed to convert RTD to Centigrade
363 
364  // Start the conversion (assumes we are using single shot mode)
365  start();
366 
367  // Wait for DRDY to go valid
368  while((drdy == false) && (_millis() < (start_time + ADS122C04_CONVERSION_TIMEOUT)))
369  {
370  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(5)); // Don't pound the bus too hard
371  drdy = checkDataReady();
372  }
373 
374  // Check if we timed out
375  if (drdy == false)
376  {
377  if (_printDebug == true)
378  {
379  LOG("readPT100Centigrade: checkDataReady timed out");
380  }
381  return(ret_val);
382  }
383 
384  // Read the conversion result
385  if(ADS122C04_getConversionData(&raw_v.UINT32) == false)
386  {
387  if (_printDebug == true)
388  {
389  LOG("readPT100Centigrade: ADS122C04_getConversionData failed");
390  }
391  return(ret_val);
392  }
393 
394  // The raw voltage is in the bottom 24 bits of raw_temp
395  // If we just do a <<8 we will multiply the result by 256
396  // Instead pad out the MSB with the MS bit of the 24 bits
397  // to preserve the two's complement
398  if ((raw_v.UINT32 & 0x00800000) == 0x00800000)
399  {
400  raw_v.UINT32 |= 0xFF000000;
401  }
402 
403  // raw_v.UINT32 now contains the ADC result, correctly signed
404  // Now we need to convert it to temperature using the PT100 resistance,
405  // the gain, excitation current and reference resistor value
406 
407  // Formulae are taken from:
408  // http://www.ti.com/lit/an/sbaa275/sbaa275.pdf
409  // https://www.analog.com/media/en/technical-documentation/application-notes/AN709_0.pdf
410 
411  // 2^23 is 8388608
412  RTD = ((float)raw_v.INT32) / 8388608.0; // Load RTD with the scaled ADC value
413  RTD *= PT100_REFERENCE_RESISTOR; // Multiply by the reference resistor
414  // Use the correct gain for high and low temperatures
415  if ((_wireMode == ADS122C04_4WIRE_HI_TEMP) || (_wireMode == ADS122C04_3WIRE_HI_TEMP) || (_wireMode == ADS122C04_2WIRE_HI_TEMP))
416  {
417  RTD /= PT100_AMP_GAIN_HI_TEMP; // Divide by the amplifier gain for high temperatures
418  }
419  else
420  {
421  RTD /= PT100_AMPLIFIER_GAIN; // Divide by the amplifier gain for low temperatures
422  }
423  if ((_wireMode == ADS122C04_3WIRE_MODE) || (_wireMode == ADS122C04_3WIRE_HI_TEMP)) // If we are using 3-wire mode
424  {
425  RTD *= 2.0; // 3-wire mode needs a factor of 2
426  }
427 
428  // RTD now contains the PT100 resistance in Ohms
429  // Now we need to convert this to temperature
430 
431  // Calculate the temperature
432  ret_val = RTD * -23.10e-9;
433  ret_val += 17.5848089e-6;
434  ret_val = sqrt(ret_val);
435  ret_val -= 3.9083e-3;
436  ret_val /= -1.155e-6;
437 
438  // Check if the temperature is positive, return if it is
439  if (ret_val >= 0.0)
440  return(ret_val);
441 
442  // The temperature is negative so we need to use a different formula
443  ret_val = -242.02;
444  ret_val += 2.2228 * RTD;
445  POLY = RTD * RTD; // Load the polynomial with RTD^2
446  ret_val += 2.5859e-3 * POLY;
447  POLY *= RTD; // Load the polynomial with RTD^3
448  ret_val -= 4.8260e-6 * POLY;
449  POLY *= RTD; // Load the polynomial with RTD^4
450  ret_val -= 2.8183e-8 * POLY;
451  POLY *= RTD; // Load the polynomial with RTD^5
452  ret_val += 1.5243e-10 * POLY;
453 
454  return(ret_val);
455 }
456 
461 float SFE_ADS122C04::readPT100Fahrenheit(void) // Read the temperature in Fahrenheit
462 {
463  return((readPT100Centigrade() * 1.8) + 32.0); // Read Centigrade and convert to Fahrenheit
464 }
465 
472 int32_t SFE_ADS122C04::readRawVoltage(uint8_t rate)
473 {
474  raw_voltage_union raw_v; // union to convert uint32_t to int32_t
475  unsigned long start_time = _millis(); // Record the start time so we can timeout
476  bool drdy = false; // DRDY (1 == new data is ready)
477  uint8_t previousWireMode = _wireMode; // Record the previous wire mode so we can restore it
478  uint8_t previousRate = ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.DR; // Record the previous rate so we can restore it
479 
480  // Configure the ADS122C04 for raw mode
481  // Disable the IDAC, use the internal 2.048V reference and set the gain to 1
482  if ((configureADCmode(ADS122C04_RAW_MODE, rate)) == false)
483  {
484  if (_printDebug == true)
485  {
486  LOG("readRawVoltage: configureADCmode (1) failed");
487  }
488  return(0);
489  }
490 
491  // Start the conversion (assumes we are using single shot mode)
492  start();
493 
494  // Wait for DRDY to go valid
495  while((drdy == false) && (_millis() < (start_time + ADS122C04_CONVERSION_TIMEOUT)))
496  {
497  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(5)); // Don't pound the bus too hard
498  drdy = checkDataReady();
499  }
500 
501  // Check if we timed out
502  if (drdy == false)
503  {
504  if (_printDebug == true)
505  {
506  LOG("readRawVoltage: checkDataReady timed out");
507  }
508  configureADCmode(previousWireMode, previousRate); // Attempt to restore the previous wire mode
509  return(0);
510  }
511 
512  // Read the conversion result
513  if(ADS122C04_getConversionData(&raw_v.UINT32) == false)
514  {
515  if (_printDebug == true)
516  {
517  LOG("readRawVoltage: ADS122C04_getConversionData failed");
518  }
519  configureADCmode(previousWireMode, previousRate); // Attempt to restore the previous wire mode
520  return(0);
521  }
522 
523  // Restore the previous wire mode
524  if ((configureADCmode(previousWireMode, previousRate)) == false)
525  {
526  if (_printDebug == true)
527  {
528  LOG("readRawVoltage: configureADCmode (2) failed");
529  }
530  return(0);
531  }
532 
533  // The raw voltage is in the bottom 24 bits of raw_temp
534  // If we just do a <<8 we will multiply the result by 256
535  // Instead pad out the MSB with the MS bit of the 24 bits
536  // to preserve the two's complement
537  if ((raw_v.UINT32 & 0x00800000) == 0x00800000)
538  raw_v.UINT32 |= 0xFF000000;
539  return(raw_v.INT32);
540 }
541 
549 uint32_t SFE_ADS122C04::readADC(void)
550 {
551  uint32_t ret_val; // The return value
552 
553  // Read the conversion result
554  if(ADS122C04_getConversionData(&ret_val) == false)
555  {
556  if (_printDebug == true)
557  {
558  LOG("readADC: ADS122C04_getConversionData failed");
559  }
560  return(0);
561  }
562 
563  return(ret_val);
564 }
565 
566 // Read the internal temperature
572 float SFE_ADS122C04::readInternalTemperature(uint8_t rate)
573 {
574  internal_temperature_union int_temp; // union to convert uint16_t to int16_t
575  uint32_t raw_temp; // The raw temperature from the ADC
576  unsigned long start_time = _millis(); // Record the start time so we can timeout
577  bool drdy = false; // DRDY (1 == new data is ready)
578  float ret_val = 0.0; // The return value
579  uint8_t previousWireMode = _wireMode; // Record the previous wire mode so we can restore it
580  uint8_t previousRate = ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.DR; // Record the previous rate so we can restore it
581 
582  // Enable the internal temperature sensor
583  // Reading the ADC value will return the temperature
584  if ((configureADCmode(ADS122C04_TEMPERATURE_MODE, rate)) == false)
585  {
586  if (_printDebug == true)
587  {
588  LOG("readInternalTemperature: configureADCmode (1) failed");
589  }
590  return(ret_val);
591  }
592 
593  // Start the conversion
594  start();
595 
596  // Wait for DRDY to go valid
597  while((drdy == false) && (_millis() < (start_time + ADS122C04_CONVERSION_TIMEOUT)))
598  {
599  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(5)); // Don't pound the bus too hard
600  drdy = checkDataReady();
601  }
602 
603  // Check if we timed out
604  if (drdy == false)
605  {
606  if (_printDebug == true)
607  {
608  LOG("readInternalTemperature: checkDataReady timed out");
609  }
610  // Attempt to restore the previous wire mode
611  configureADCmode(previousWireMode, previousRate);
612  return(ret_val);
613  }
614 
615  // Read the conversion result
616  if(ADS122C04_getConversionData(&raw_temp) == false)
617  {
618  if (_printDebug == true)
619  {
620  LOG("readInternalTemperature: ADS122C04_getConversionData failed");
621  }
622  configureADCmode(previousWireMode, previousRate); // Attempt to restore the previous wire mode
623  return(ret_val);
624  }
625 
626  // Restore the previous wire mode
627  if ((configureADCmode(previousWireMode, previousRate)) == false)
628  {
629  if (_printDebug == true)
630  {
631  LOG("readInternalTemperature: configureADCmode (2) failed");
632  }
633  return(ret_val);
634  }
635 
636  if (_printDebug == true)
637  {
638  // Output temp as hex to std output
639  std::stringstream ss;
640  ss <<
641  "readInternalTemperature: raw_temp (32-bit) = " << std::hex << raw_temp;
642  LOG(ss.str());
643  }
644 
645  // The temperature is in the top 14 bits of the bottom 24 bits of raw_temp
646  int_temp.UINT16 = (uint16_t)(raw_temp >> 10); // Extract the 14-bit value
647 
648  // The signed temperature is now in the bottom 14 bits of int_temp.UINT16
649  // If we just do a <<2 we will multiply the result by 4
650  // Instead we will pad out the two MS bits with the MS bit of the 14 bits
651  // to preserve the two's complement
652  if ((int_temp.UINT16 & 0x2000) == 0x2000) // Check if the MS bit is 1
653  {
654  int_temp.UINT16 |= 0xC000; // Value is negative so pad with 1's
655  }
656  else
657  {
658  int_temp.UINT16 &= 0x3FFF; // Value is positive so make sure the two MS bits are 0
659  }
660 
661  ret_val = ((float)int_temp.INT16) * TEMPERATURE_SENSOR_RESOLUTION; // Convert to float including the 2 bit shift
662  return(ret_val);
663 }
664

1040 bool SFE_ADS122C04::ADS122C04_init(ADS122C04_initParam *param)
1041 {
1042  ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.all = 0; // Reset all four register values to the default value of 0x00
1043  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.all = 0;
1044  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.all = 0;
1045  ADS122C04_Reg.reg3.all = 0;
1046 
1047  ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.bit.MUX = param->inputMux;
1048  ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.bit.GAIN = param->gainLevel;
1049  ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.bit.PGA_BYPASS = param->pgaBypass;
1050 
1051  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.DR = param->dataRate;
1052  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.MODE = param->opMode;
1053  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.CMBIT = param->convMode;
1054  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.VREF = param->selectVref;
1055  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.TS = param->tempSensorEn;
1056 
1057  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.DCNT = param->dataCounterEn;
1058  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.CRC = param->dataCRCen;
1059  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.BCS = param->burnOutEn;
1060  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.IDAC = param->idacCurrent;
1061 
1062  ADS122C04_Reg.reg3.bit.I1MUX = param->routeIDAC1;
1063  ADS122C04_Reg.reg3.bit.I2MUX = param->routeIDAC2;
1064 
1065  bool ret_val = true; // Flag to show if the four writeRegs were successful
1066  // (If any one writeReg returns false, ret_val will be false)
1067  ret_val &= ADS122C04_writeReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_0_REG, ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.all);
1068  ret_val &= ADS122C04_writeReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_1_REG, ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.all);
1069  ret_val &= ADS122C04_writeReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_2_REG, ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.all);
1070  ret_val &= ADS122C04_writeReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_3_REG, ADS122C04_Reg.reg3.all);
1071 
1072  // Read and print the new configuration (if enableDebugging has been called)
1073  printADS122C04config();
1074 
1075  return(ret_val);
1076 }
1077 
1078 
1082 void SFE_ADS122C04::printADS122C04config(void)
1083 {
1084  if (_printDebug == true)
1085  {
1086  bool successful = true; // Flag to show if the four readRegs were successful
1087  // (If any one readReg returns false, success will be false)
1088  successful &= ADS122C04_readReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_0_REG, &ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.all);
1089  successful &= ADS122C04_readReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_1_REG, &ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.all);
1090  successful &= ADS122C04_readReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_2_REG, &ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.all);
1091  successful &= ADS122C04_readReg(ADS122C04_CONFIG_3_REG, &ADS122C04_Reg.reg3.all);
1092 
1093  if (successful == false)
1094  {
1095  LOG("printADS122C04config: readReg failed");
1096  return;
1097  }
1098  else
1099  {
1100  std::stringstream ss;
1101  ss <<
1102  "ConfigReg0: MUX=" <<
1103  ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.bit.MUX <<
1104  " GAIN=" <<
1105  ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.bit.GAIN <<
1106  " PGA_BYPASS=" <<
1107  ADS122C04_Reg.reg0.bit.PGA_BYPASS;
1108  LOG(ss.str());
1109  ss.clear();
1110 
1111  ss <<
1112  "ConfigReg1: DR=" <<
1113  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.DR <<
1114  " MODE=" <<
1115  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.MODE <<
1116  " CMBIT=" <<
1117  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.CMBIT <<
1118  " VREF="<<
1119  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.VREF <<
1120  " TS=" <<
1121  ADS122C04_Reg.reg1.bit.TS;
1122  LOG(ss.str());
1123  ss.clear();
1124 
1125  ss <<
1126  "ConfigReg2: DCNT=" <<
1127  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.DCNT <<
1128  " CRC=" <<
1129  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.CRC <<
1130  " BCS=" <<
1131  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.BCS <<
1132  " IDAC=" <<
1133  ADS122C04_Reg.reg2.bit.IDAC;
1134  LOG(ss.str());
1135  ss.clear();
1136 
1137  ss <<
1138  "ConfigReg3: I1MUX=" <<
1139  ADS122C04_Reg.reg3.bit.I1MUX <<
1140  " I2MUX=" <<
1141  ADS122C04_Reg.reg3.bit.I2MUX;
1142  LOG(ss.str());
1143  ss.clear();
1144  }
1145  }
1146 }

1174 
1182 bool SFE_ADS122C04::ADS122C04_writeReg(uint8_t reg, uint8_t writeValue)
1183 {
1184  uint8_t command = 0;
1185  command = ADS122C04_WRITE_CMD(reg);
1186  return(ADS122C04_sendCommandWithValue(command, writeValue));
1187 }
1188 
1195 bool SFE_ADS122C04::ADS122C04_readReg(uint8_t reg, uint8_t *readValue)
1196 {
1197  uint8_t command = 0;
1198  command = ADS122C04_READ_CMD(reg);
1199 
1200  *readValue = i2c_smbus_read_byte_data(_i2c_fd, (uint8_t)command);
1201  if (*readValue < 0){
1202  // -ve errno returned if the read failed.
1203  return false;
1204  }
1205 
1206  return true;
1207 }
1208 
1214 bool SFE_ADS122C04::ADS122C04_sendCommand(uint8_t command)
1215 {
1216  // Return true on success, else false. No way to recover error code.
1217  return i2c_smbus_write_byte(_i2c_fd, command) == 0;
1218 }
1219 
1225 bool SFE_ADS122C04::ADS122C04_sendCommandWithValue(uint8_t command, uint8_t value)
1226 {
1227  // Return true on success, else false. No way to recover error code.
1228  return i2c_smbus_write_byte_data(_i2c_fd, command, value) == 0;
1229 }
1230 
1247 bool SFE_ADS122C04::ADS122C04_getConversionDataWithCount(
1248  uint32_t *conversionData,
1249  uint8_t *count
1250  ){
1251  uint8_t RXByte_s = 5;
1252  uint8_t RXByte[RXByte_s] = {0};
1253 
1254  int read = i2c_smbus_read_i2c_block_data(_i2c_fd, ADS122C04_RDATA_CMD, RXByte_s, RXByte);
1255 
1256  if (read < 0){
1257  LOG("Conversion with count read error. Code: " << read << ".");
1258  return false;
1259  }
1260 
1261  // RXByte[0] should be the number of bytes read, which should be 4
1262  if (RXByte[0] == 3){
1263  LOG("Only 3 bytes available. Enable DCNT or request"
1264  " conversion data without count.");
1265  }
1266 
1267  *count = RXByte[1];
1268  *conversionData =
1269  ((uint32_t)RXByte[4]) |
1270  ((uint32_t)RXByte[3]<<8) |
1271  ((uint32_t)RXByte[2]<<16);
1272 
1273  return(true);
1274 }
1275 
1287 bool SFE_ADS122C04::ADS122C04_getConversionData(uint32_t *conversionData)
1288 {
1289  uint8_t RXByte_s = 2;
1290  uint8_t RXByte[RXByte_s] = {0, 0};
1291 
1292  int read = i2c_smbus_read_i2c_block_data(_i2c_fd, ADS122C04_RDATA_CMD, RXByte_s, RXByte);
1293 
1294  if (read < 0){
1295  LOG("Conversion without count, read error. Code: " << read << ".");
1296  return false;
1297  }
1298 
1299  // Otherwise the counter is disabled and the data is in the correct place.
1300  // Last element should be empty.
1301  *conversionData =
1302  ((uint32_t)RXByte[1]) |
1303  ((uint32_t)RXByte[0]<<8);
1304 
1305  // int secd = (int) *conversionData;//(((int) *conversionData) << 16) >> 16;
1306  // LOG("Conversion data " << secd);
1307 
1308  return true;
1309 }
1310 
1315 ADS122C04_initParam* SFE_ADS122C04::getCurrentInitParams(){
1316  return &lastInitParams;
1317 }
1318 
1323 bool SFE_ADS122C04::reinitialise(){
1324  return ADS122C04_init(&lastInitParams);
1325 }
